include-builtin-color-channels.name: Include built-in color channels
include-builtin-color-channels.description: Will the color channels for the BG, G, MG, etc... will be included in the generated triggers as well

show-parsing-notif.name: Show 'parsing level' notification
show-parsing-notif.description: Shows a notification that the level is being parsed when generating color triggers

use-gd-grid-space.name: Use GD grid space
use-gd-grid-space.description: If enabled, it will center the given coordinate on the grid. If disabled: 1 grid unit = 30 X/Y
